summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from November 1 to November 30, 2013. It details various debits and credits, including incoming transfers and preauthorized debits, providing insight into the financial activities during that period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Tina Tollison
persons.context: Tina Tollison is referenced in relation to an outgoing money transfer to Bank of America.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for November 2013, including a beginning balance of $253,127.76 and an ending balance of $198,382.56.
Significant transactions include an incoming money transfer of $450,932.56 and an outgoing transfer of $10,229.04.
Multiple preauthorized debits for tax services were recorded, totaling significant amounts throughout the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
There are references to fees associated with NSF (non-sufficient funds) and overdrafts.
